articles.title: Wales elects Vaughan Gething, first Black national leader in Europe - CBS News
articles.description: Gething will be the first Black leader of a government in the U.K. - and, by some definitions, of any European country.
articles.content:
Vaughan Gething won the Welsh Labour Party leadership contest on Saturday, and is set to become the first Black leader of Wales' semi-autonomous government.
Gething, who is currently Welsh economy m… [+2680 chars]
